articles.description: Reaction as Aston Villa battle back to draw 3-3 at home to Liverpool but miss a chance to confirm Champions League qualification, plus build-up to Tottenham v Manchester City.
articles.title: Reaction as Villa earn dramatic draw but made to wait for Champions League spot

articles.description: Elite sprinting is dominated by black athletes. Theories as to why span painful history and cutting-edge science - and many are unproven.
articles.title: Race and sprinting: What is behind Olympic podium race divide?

articles.description: World Cup captain Millie Bright returns to the England squad for the first time since October after recovering from injury.
articles.title: Millie Bright returns to England squad for Euro qualifiers

articles.description: Manchester United defender Raphael Varane will leave the club when his contract runs out in the summer.
articles.title: Raphael Varane to leave Manchester United at end of season

articles.description: BBC Sport's F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions before this weekend's Emilia Romagna Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A before Imola: Norris, Verstappen, McLaren, Red Bull, Sainz, Ricciardo

articles.description: BBC Sport explores the impact of the Saudi boxing takeover and what it means for the fighting game closer to home.
articles.title: Tyson Fury v Oleksandr Usyk: A look at Saudi Arabia's boxing takeover

articles.description: Scottie Scheffler says he is "as prepared as possible" for the US PGA Championship after he and his wife, Meredith, welcomed their first child last week.
articles.title: US PGA: Scottie Scheffler ready for major after birth of son

articles.description: Ice hockey player Victor Bjorkung speaks to BBC Sport about the pain of losing Nottingham Panthers team-mate Adam Johnson.
articles.title: Adam Johnson death: Team-mate Victor Bjorkung still gets 'flashbacks'

articles.description: Arsenal women have packed out Emirates Stadium this season and it will become their main home in the 2024-25 campaign.
articles.title: Arsenal women: Emirates Stadium becomes main home for next season

articles.description: The Oklahoma City Thunder beat the Dallas Mavericks to level their NBA play-off series, while the Boston Celtics take a 3-1 lead against the Cleveland Cavaliers.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Thunder beat Mavericks, Celtics fend off Cavaliers
